Game: Konductra 2006-10-31T00:00:00-07:00 Konductra is a puzzle game for the Nintendo DS published by O~3 Entertainment. The game had an interesting development cycle, with IGN revealing the title on November 23, 2005. At the time independent developer oeFun had started work without having a publisher lined up. oeFun and O~3 came into a publishing agreement in the summer of 2006 after the title was finished. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/ed6b2715-de54-4263-b06e-b2f6a83ab124.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/166f91c4-4f27-446f-92d1-8bbb0aa2bd70.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/4220c2d9-6792-48fb-a7b9-30af3bfbfa3e.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/a05e3b74-9d67-40fd-9e2a-7b08a708dfbf.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konductra Puzzle oeFun O~3 Entertainment
